head: Head
profile_createAccountHint: Create an account to save your achievements and access all platform features.
profile_emailExistsError: A user with this email is already registered. Please sign in.
profile_seedHint: Write something and watch the avatar change!
profile_ageHint: To select materials of appropriate difficulty
profile_countryHint: For geography and history lessons of your country
checkYourEmail: Please check your email to confirm your registration.
profile_confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this connection?
confirm_invitation_subtitle: Create a password to protect your account.
password_requirements: Minimum 8 characters, don't use overly simple passwords.
profile_passwordHint: If you signed in via a link, set a permanent password here.
resetLinkSent: Password reset link has been sent.
enterEmailForReset: Enter your email to reset your password.
error_weak_password: This password is too simple. Please come up with something more complex.
error_unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
about_intro_1: 70,000 years ago, the Cognitive Revolution made us human. Today, in the age of AI, it's time for the second Cognitive Leap.
about_intro_2: Forget 11 years at a desk. Our gaming platform allows you to master the school curriculum in 2-3 years through engaging 2D games, as well as Minecraft and Roblox worlds.
about_body_1: Traditional school is a conveyor belt that treats everyone the same, killing the joy of discovery. Cognitive Leap is the alternative. We replace the conveyor belt with a personal GPS for knowledge. Instead of classes, we have a map of 260 topics linked by logic, not a schedule. Our system builds a unique and fast learning path for each student.
about_body_2_part1: We don't create lessons from scratch; we curate the
about_body_2_part2: from around the world, from YouTube lectures to interactive simulations.
about_invitation_intro: Education is an ecosystem, and we invite you to build it with us.
about_text_parents: Help us turn learning into an exciting adventure by finding the best content to unlock your child's potential.
about_text_educators_part1: Break free from routine. Let our platform handle the basics so you can focus on what truly matters: mentoring and inspiring students.
about_text_educatorsLinkText: Become a leading curator in your subject!
about_conclusion: Let's make this cognitive leap together and build the education our children deserve.
profile_identityExistsHint: It seems you already have an account with this email. Please sign in using your password or the 'Forgot Password' option. After signing in, you can link your Google account in your profile settings.
profile_hubInvitation_part1: Teachers and parents! Help us make Cognitive Leap better by adding the best videos and interactive materials to
materialLockedTooltip: Material is locked. Complete previous prerequisites first.

form.publicHelp: Anyone with the link will be able to view a public program.
form.prerequisitesHelp: Set up the sequence in which lessons must be completed.

add.typeExternal_desc: Use this option if you are unsure whether the author agrees to the use of their material on our platform. The link will open in a new tab.
add.typeVideoInternal_desc: Use this option if you are sure the author agrees to the use of their material on our platform. The video will open in our player.
add.typeApp_desc: For interactive content such as games or simulations. Requires a .zip archive with an index.html file in the root.
add.typePresentation_desc: For interactive presentations (e.g., exported from Genially). Requires a .zip archive with an index.html file in the root.

delete.title: Confirm Deletion
delete.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete “{materialName}”? This action cannot be undone.

unpin.title: Confirm Unpin
unpin.message: Are you sure you want to unpin “{materialName}” from this lesson?

deleteSubject.title: Delete Subject
deleteSubject.message: Are you sure you want to delete the subject “{subjectName}”? All its lessons and material links will be permanently removed.

deleteLesson.title: Delete Lesson
deleteLesson.message: Are you sure you want to delete the lesson “{lessonName}”? All its material links will be permanently removed.

deleteProgram.title: Delete Program
deleteProgram.message: Are you sure you want to delete the program “{programName}”? This will not delete the subjects or lessons within it, but will remove the program itself.

programs.title: Select Program
programs.noPrograms: You haven't created any programs yet.
